location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Map showing boundaries between Iraq, Kuwait and Najd’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:332 x 390 mm, on sheet 408 x 460 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Simla Drawing Office.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Map marked ‘For Official Use only’. No. 4192. Copied from sheets H38 and H 39 of the maps of Eastern Turkey in Asia drawn to scale 1;1,000,000.Boundaries indicated by red, black and pecked lines with a key provided below title.
